description: We take a deep dive into the Kult of Speed Detachment from Codex: Orks and talk about what's in it, how it works, and what a list using it looks like.
title: Detachment Focus: Kult of Speed

description: The Goonhammer Open was a weekend full of tournaments across the Warhammer ecosystem. Join us for an event report, from a player and the tournament organizer, from the one-day tournament of the ULTIMATE COMPETITIVE MINIATURES GAME: Warhammer Underworlds! Saturday Marquis of Peaches: Saturday was a long day for me! I spent Friday night on a […]
title: Warhammer Underworlds: Earning Glory at Goonhammer Open US, Part 1

description: Infinity N5 Announced for October 2025 Note: the new rules will be available online 20th October. There should be previews throughout Infinity Global Week (a promotional thing running all next week) so stay tuned for more on this.  Genghis Cohen: Shocking! I think there’s been a reasonable amount of time for N4 to reach maturity […]
title: Infinity: Gencon Seminar and N5 Announcement Reaction

description: We take a deep dive into the Path to Glory mechanics in Age of Sigmar's 4th edition and how they're a massive improvement over third.
title: Age of Sigmar 4th Edition Path to Glory – The Goonhammer Review

description: One of the big selling points for Conquest is that it’s two games for the price of one, using the same minis to play both The Last Argument of Kings (TLAOK) and First Blood (FB). But I’ve been playing in the world of Conquest longer than most, and the idea of playing FB basically didn’t […]
title: Reflections From a Conquest: First Blood Tourist

description: Welcome to part two of our coverage of the King’s Landing campaign for A Song of Ice and Fire: Tabletop Miniatures Game. You can find part one here. WARNING: There will be spoilers for the first season of House of the Dragon and possibly the second season. I will try to avoid major plot points […]
title: ASOIAF Tactics – King’s Landing Initial Review Part Two, The Greens
